MAIN_MESSAGE: It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown for safety at 6:41PM in the CH8 postcode area Holywell following reports of a grounded overhead electrical line. This may affect the supply to your property. Our engineers are on site to investigate and repair the fault. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 8:45PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7:30PM on 14th February 2021.
